mapper.insert: insert into tag_record (id, user_id, tag_id, create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{tagId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.select: select id, user_id, tag_id, create_time, update_time from tag_record
